definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: I overdid it in the gym and hurt my back.
sentences.chinese: 我在健身房練得過火了，結果弄傷了背。

sentences.english: Be careful not to hurt yourself.
Two years ago , Zhou Kai hurt his arm while playing football.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前，周凱在踢足球時弄傷了胳膊。

sentences.english: We had been visiting her cousin Mike who had managed to break his leg in a skateboard accident.
sentences.chinese: 之前我們在探望她那玩滑板弄傷了腿的表哥邁克。

sentences.english: She had a fall and hurt her back.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，把背弄傷了。

sentences.english: I decided to disturb the pattern, which unfortunately, resulted in wounding one.
sentences.chinese: 我決定打亂他們的隊伍，很不幸把其中一隻弄傷了。

sentences.english: I knew you'd hurt your feet with those silly shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我早就知道那雙笨鞋會弄傷你的腳。

sentences.english: I bandage his knuckles, which is hard with these claws I have.
sentences.chinese: 我用繃帶包紮他被我爪子弄傷的指關節。

sentences.english: She told him she hurt her foot while sleepwalking!
sentences.chinese: 她說自己是在夢遊的時候把腳弄傷的。

sentences.english: She wore heavy leather gloves to protect her hands while she worked.
sentences.chinese: 幹活時她戴着厚厚的皮手套，免得弄傷手。

sentences.english: The girl sympathized with her little brother who had hurt himself.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩同情她那把他自己弄傷了的小弟弟。

sentences.english: Tomoya finds out that she's getting hurt using a blunt knife and confiscates it.
sentences.chinese: 朋也發現她被這把很鈍的小刀弄傷了，於是將其沒收。

sentences.english: Employee hurt his back chasing a beaver.
sentences.chinese: 在追海狸的時候弄傷了背。

sentences.english: One day Barry had been out playing and cut his arm on a barbed-wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 一天，巴里在外面玩，被帶刺的籬笆弄傷了他的胳膊。

sentences.english: He cannot work today, he got a gash in his hand while axing.
sentences.chinese: 他今天無法工作，因爲他在使用斧頭時手被弄傷了。

sentences.english: The pitcher left the game because he injured his throwing arm.
sentences.chinese: 那位投手因爲弄傷了他投球的那蘋手臂而中途退場。
